title: "AWS to debut Asia-Pacific infrastructure in Bangkok"
excerpt: "Amazon Web Services (AWS), the cloud service arm under tech giant Amazon, has announced plans to roll out its Asia-Pacific infrastructure in Bangkok while vowing to invest more than US$5 billion (190 billion baht) in Thailand over the next 15 years."
